title: Zenith Technologies-Automation, Process Control and Manufacturing Execution Systems
text:
Change management Manufacturing execution systems software 
Our Shopfloor-Online MES configurable software achieves measurable improvements in efficiency, output and compliance, in addition to quality and customer satisfaction, for manufacturing companies. 
Catering for batch, continuous and discrete manufacturing models, Shopfloor-Online provides real-time visibility of the entire manufacturing environment, from the ERP and warehouse systems to the laboratory information management system (LIMS) and deviation management systems. 
It also supports various functions, such as production engineering, maintenance, engineering, quality and operational management.Shopfloor-Online enables clients to improve quality, performance and on-time delivery while decreasing spoilage/waste and downtime. Specialised manufacturing execution system (MES) services 
Manufacturers install new organisational structures and technology systems to achieve excellence in order to minimise time and costs. 
Zenith Technologies consultants help clients restructure their operations and optimise performance in core production process. 
For more information, please visit the 'LZ Lifescience and Manufacturing Execution Systems (MES)' page on our 'Products & Services' tab. Cloud-based environmental, health and safety (EHS) products and services

Zenith Technologies specialises in independent industrial IT solutions, which are specifically focused in life sciences, pharmaceutical and medical device industries.
